item.title: WBA
item.description: score:60 Chances: Walgreens Boots Alliance is set to post its second-quarter earnings results, which could potentially bring positive news for investors. The US GDP reading for the fourth quarter is expected to show a 3.2% growth rate, which may bode well for the overall market sentiment.
